ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Numbers on Bards
ygData.msgSnippet: The best clerics I group with understand that cheal is only mana-efficient above a certain hit point range, which Bards rarely reach.  They re also aware of
ygData.messageBody:
The best clerics I group with understand that cheal is only mana-efficient above a certain hit point
range, which Bards rarely reach. They're also aware of the fact that we have maybe 55% the hit points of
a major tank. The bad ones don't. I don't like playing with the bad ones. I always end up hearing "wow,
you died fast". No kidding.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 55 songs, Innoruuk



"Daniel P. Sniderman" wrote:

> It's pretty clear that the clerics who think that Complete Heal is their
> bread-and-butter spell don't know what they are doing. I feel a lot more
> comfortable now when I see a cleric with a Remedy hotkey set up as soon as
> he joins the group...
